label: A9B3C2_hR28_167_ef_e_c-001
title: Cs$_{3}$Tl$_{2}$Cl$_{9}$ ($K7_{2}$) Structure
comments: (Hoard, 1935) followed by (Downs, 2003), give the atomic coordinates in the style of (Wyckoff, 1922), who lists space group $D_{3d}^6$ (the Sch\"{o}nflies notation for space group $R\overline{3}c$) as space group \#203, instead of \#167, and uses an origin which corresponds to (1/4 ~ 1/4 ~ 1/4) in our lattice coordinates.  We used FINDSYM to convert this into our standard setting for space group \#167.
